other_title: Captain Tsubasa Film 05: Der stärkste Gegner! Die holländische Juniorenauswahl (German)
Captain Tsubasa Movie 05: Saikyu no Tenki! Hollanda Youth (Japanese)
Captain Tsubasa Movie 05: The most powerful opponent! Holland Youth
Captain Tsubasa Película 05: El enemigo mas fuerte! Juvenil Holanda (Spanish)
キャプテン翼 最強の敵! オランダユース (Japanese)
plot: The last Captain Tsubasa movie is about the match between Japan and Holland. After the Japanese team lost two games against this apparently supreme opponent, their confidence is at its lowest point and even Hyuga, having a hurt leg, is desperate. Thus the management tries everything to convince Wakabayashi (living in Germany) and Tsubasa (living in Brazil) to come to Holland and to help them, but both deny. Only in the second half of the third game Tsubasa appears and joins the team, giving them back their confidence and strength. With Tsubasa Ozora as their captain again, the last game ends 11:1 for Japan.
ending_theme: "風の道で (Kaze no michi de) On the road of wind" by FACE FREE
